metadata.description:
I am a creation of Dark Matter

A symphony
of bad habits

A cacophony
of delicious talents

Stabilized and undermined by my cycle of disorder
ineffebly self destructing, painfully unperceptive

Limited by the needs that make me feel free
Freed by the limitations that make me feel needs

What?
Might as well keep that there.

Dark Matter.

Can you hear me?
(i’m yelling in my mind)

Can you speak softly?
(for my fragile heart)

Can you hold me?
(no, I mean, really. Hold me)

Can you watch me?
(fall on my sword again and then again)

Did you say yes?
(nevermind don't tell me)

Dark Matter.

Welcome to the Infinity Residence
(this is my home)
Have you ever been this deep?
I am deeper still.

Tethered by titanium tightropes
(this is my hope)
Should we stay this close?
I am closer still.

Dreams of sparring silver tongues
Tell me why there’s a tightness to your lips?
(this is my trust)
I am tighter still.

I’m on to something here

Dark Matter.

Cheers to you!

Love

To your Dark Matter!

To blissfully transmute with enchanting benevolence
You make it look so easy (so good too)

I stumble often and skid my knees
Just to wallow in the wakes of wreckage


Dark Matter.

To losing, love!

All objective sensibility
All cloaked loneliness
All overwrought escapism
All clairvoyant capability

Because
What the
Fuck!
Dark Matter.

I’ll be the one
Refusing the lifevest in hopes I drown
In infinite and unconditional love
To be engulfed by an ocean of darkness

Thank you, love!

For casting illuminating beams across the galaxy that is me
Still, so much remains to be seen

Cosmic uncertainty
Expansive emptiness
Shadowed serenity


We depart, we return
We cease, we remain
We bury, we exhume
We sow, we reap
